item.name: Total DC Power Available
item.description: Chassis total DC power available, which displays the total DC power available for the entire chassis. It is the sum of the two power domains.

item.name: Total AC Power Used
item.description: Chassis total AC power being used, which displays the total AC power being consumed by all modules in the chassis. It also includes power consumed by the blowers (chassis oooling devices) for the chassis.

item.name: Total Thermal Output
item.description: Chassis total thermal output, which displays the thermal output (load) in BTUs per hour. It is calculated based on the total AC power in use. (1 Watt = 3.412 BTU/hour).

item_prototype.name: {#BLADENAME} Inlet Temperature
item_prototype.description: Temperature reading for an IPMI blade expressed in degrees centigrade(C). An octet string expressed as 'sddd.dd Centigrade' where: s is the sign ('-' for negative or blank space for positive) d is a decimal digit or blank space for leading zeroes. The string 'Not Readable!' indicates that the given monitor is not supported on this system. The string 'No Temperature' indicates that the given monitor does not exist on this system or is powered off.

item_prototype.name: {#BLADENAME} 3.3V Sensor Voltage
item_prototype.description: Voltage reading for an IPMI blade expressed in Volts(V). An octet string expressed as 'sdd.dd Volts' where: s is the sign ('-' for negative or '+' for positive) d is a decimal digit or blank space for a leading zero. The string 'Not Readable!' indicates that the given monitor is not supported on this system. The string 'No Voltage' indicates that the given monitor does not exist on this system or is powered off.

item_prototype.name: {#BLADENAME} 5V Sensor Voltage

An octet string expressed as 'sdd.dd Volts' where: s is the sign ('-' for negative or '+' for positive) d is a decimal digit or blank space for a leading zero. The string 'Not Readable!' indicates that the given monitor is not supported on this system. The string 'No Voltage' indicates that the given monitor does not exist on this system or is powered off.
